item.title: Update: Galaxy Digital has sold off all but 15,902 Bitcoin from its address, with a total of 5,153 Bitcoin transferred out in the last 50 minutes.
item.description: On July 25th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), it was monitored that within the past 50 minutes, the Galaxy Digital sell-off address has transferred a total of 5153 bitcoins, with a total value of 5.96 billion US dollars.Among them, 3313 bitcoins (3.83 billion US dollars) were clearly deposited into a centralized exchange (CEX), and USDT continues to be withdrawn from the CEX; the remaining BTC was transferred to a new address whose ownership remains unclear.As of the time of writing, the remaining balance in this sell-off address is 15,902 bitcoins.

item.title: The Smarter Web Company announces an additional purchase of 225 bitcoins, increasing its total holdings to 1825 bitcoins
item.description: On July 25th, as per an official announcement, The Smarter Web Company has made an announcement regarding the purchase of an additional 225 bitcoins. The average price for each bitcoin is approximately $118,076. As a result, its total holdings have now reached 1825 bitcoins.

item.title: Letsbonk's market share in the past 24 hours has reached 72.5%, with revenue and transaction volume both exceeding pump.fun by 4 times.
item.description: On July 25th, based on Dune Data, Solana's launchpad Letsbonk has generated a revenue of $1,249,064 within the past 24 hours. Meanwhile, pump.fun has earned $278,617 in revenue during the same time frame.On the contrary, Letsbonk has achieved a trading volume of $124 million in the past 24 hours, while pump.fun has had a trading volume of $26.899 million during the same period.In terms of market share, Letsbonk has reached 72.5%, which is significantly higher than pump.fun's 11.6%.

item.title: Binance Alpha Lnfi Network (LN) Airdrop Threshold 200 Points
item.description: July 25th, as per an official announcement, the trading of Lnfi Network (LN) on Binance Alpha is set to commence on July 25, 2025, at 16:00 (UTC+8). After the trading initiates, users possessing at least 200 Binance Alpha points will be eligible to claim a 600 LN token airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies. In case the event is not yet completed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 10 points every hour.

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: Thai-Cambodian Conflict Escalation Boosts Safe-Haven Demand, BTC Support Tested at $115,000, Watching for Rebound Attempt and Sentiment Indicators
item.description: July 25th: The armed conflict along the Thailand-Cambodia border intensified on July 25th. Thailand dispatched F-16 fighter jets for bombing, while Cambodia appealed to the United Nations. This conflict has sparked global concerns regarding the stability of the Southeast Asian supply chain. Against the backdrop of escalating diplomatic tensions, the Asian markets witnessed an increase in risk-off sentiment, with funds flowing into gold and the U.S. dollar.In the crypto market, parallel signs of risk-off outflows began to emerge. The price of BTC dropped below the recent strong support level of $115,000. From a liquidation density standpoint, the range from $120,000 to $121,500 above constitutes a significant resistance barrier.Bitunix Analyst's Recommendation:A geopolitical event has led to a deterioration in short-term market risk appetite. If BTC fails to promptly reclaim $115,000, there is a likelihood of a double-dip or a decline to $112,300. The recommended strategy is to ob

item.title: Galaxy Digital has once again transferred out 2850 Bitcoin from its selling address, and currently holds 21,255 Bitcoin.
item.description: On July 25th, according to Arkham's monitoring, the sell-off address of Galaxy Digital continues to transfer Bitcoin to CEX and third-party addresses. 19 minutes ago, this address once again dispatched 2850 BTC. Meanwhile, another Galaxy Digital address also transferred 478 BTC to this Galaxy Digital sell-off address.As of the time of this writing, this address still holds 21,255 BTC.

item.title: The Hubei court in China has sentenced a criminal in a virtual currency theft case using backdoor code to a fraud charge, involving approximately 77.76 million yuan.
item.description: July 25th. He and others resorted to using a "backdoor" to manipulate platform data, facilitating the transfer of the virtual currency pledged by investors on the platform. Within just two months, 103 investors suffered losses amounting to approximately RMB 77.76 million in virtual currency.After the Yumen County Procuratorate in Hubei Province, China, initiated a public prosecution, in March of this year, the first-instance court sentenced He and four others to fixed-term imprisonment ranging from three to thirteen years for fraud, with each also being imposed with fines ranging from 20,000 to 300,000 yuan. He appealed the first-instance judgment. Recently, the second-instance court ruled to dismiss the appeal and uphold the original judgment.In August 2017, He and Jia (dealt with separately) established a technology company. In July 2020, He and Jia independently designed and hired Du to develop a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange platform (a platform where users can trade cr

item.title: A certain whale trader is betting on Bitcoin surpassing $200,000 by the end of the year through a complex options strategy.
item.description: On July 25th, a Bitcoin whale is utilizing a sophisticated options approach to place a large-scale bullish wager, with the goal of achieving a year-end Bitcoin price of $200,000. The trader has concurrently purchased 3,500 contracts of the $140,000 December call option on Deribit and sold 3,500 contracts of the $200,000 December call option. This indicates that if the BTC settlement price reaches or surpasses the higher $200,000 strike price prior to the expiration date, the strategy will achieve maximum profit. (CoinDesk)

item.title: Galaxy Digital once again Deposits 2850 Bitcoins to CEX
item.description: On July 25th, according to Arkham Monitor, Galaxy Digital once more transferred 2850 bitcoins to CEX just 8 minutes ago.

item.title: AguilaTrades has been liquidated again on a 720 Bitcoin long position
item.description: On July 25th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, AguilaTrades was once again liquidated for a long position of 720 bitcoins. Their total loss has now exceeded 36 million US dollars.
